name: OTX pulse_name=Operation Cleaver
pattern:
rule csext   
   {   
      
     meta:   
       author = "Cylance"   
       date = "2014-12-02"   
       description = "http://cylance.com/opcleaver"   
      
     strings:   
       $s1 = "COM+ System Extentions"   
       $s2 = "csext.exe"   
       $s3 = "COM_Extentions_bin"   
      
     condition:   
       all of them   
   }
